name: Cube Man (itch) (Kristofer Stevenson)
description:
Made by Kristofer Stevenson

Cube Man is a 2D platformer prototype that was developed in the Unity Engine.

It's purpose was to experiment with the use of tilesets. 

There is a secret in the level if you can find it!

Minimum system requirements

Operating System: Windows 10 Version 18362.0 or lower

CPU: Intel Core i3-4170 or better

GPU: Nvidia GeForce GT 640 or better

HDD: 200 MB free space

RAM: 4 GB

VRAM: 2 GB
